summary: Since 1995, the Department of Defense's financial management has been on our High Risk List . Thousands of audit findings from DOD's department-wide financial statement audits in 2018 show the extent of improvements needed. Our 2017 recommendation prompted DOD to develop a centralized database that uses real-time data to track audit findings and its progress in addressing them. However, some of the data used to...
title: DOD Financial Management: Continued Efforts Needed to Correct Material Weaknesses Identified in Financial Statement Audits
topics: Consolidated Financial Statements of the U.S. Government
